contents.delivery: We guarantee timely delivery of your order, whether within the city or to remote areas.
contents.ensurance: All products come with a long-term warranty against defects.

contents.replacement: Easy exchange and return service within a set period after receipt.

HowItWorks.MainTitle: How to order from the store?
HowItWorks.SubTitle: Four simple and quick steps to order products from the store

StepsContent.SelectProducts: Choose the products you wish to purchase and browse the specifications and reviews to help you decide.
StepsContent.AddToCart: Add the products to your shopping cart to complete the order at your convenience.
StepsContent.FillTheForm: Enter your delivery details accurately (name, address, and phone number) to ensure fast and error-free delivery.
StepsContent.SendViaWhatsapp: Click the 'Order via WhatsApp' button to send your order details directly to the support team and complete the purchase easily and quickly.

FAQ.MainTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About the Store
FAQ.SubTitle: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our products, shipping, warranty, and payment and return policies.

QuestionTitle.warranty: Do you provide a warranty for phones and laptops?
QuestionTitle.installments: Can I pay for the phone or laptop in installments?
QuestionTitle.guaranteed: Are the devices original and guaranteed?
QuestionTitle.trackOrder: How can I track my order?

QuestionAnswer.returnPolicy: You can return the product within 14 days of receipt, provided it is in its original condition and accompanied by the invoice.
QuestionAnswer.warranty: Yes, all products come with at least a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects.
QuestionAnswer.howlong: Delivery takes 2 to 5 business days within the country, depending on the region.
QuestionAnswer.cahshOnDelivery: Yes, we offer Cash on Delivery in some cities. You can check availability during checkout.
QuestionAnswer.installments: We offer easy installment plans through our banking partners, which you can view during the purchase process.
QuestionAnswer.guaranteed: Yes, we sell 100% original devices from authorized distributors, each with a warranty certificate.
QuestionAnswer.trackOrder: Once the order is shipped, you will receive an SMS or email with a tracking number and link.
